extendedInfo.description: Download the Deep Gold app edition. This application includes the whole movie in 2 and 3D!Filmed entirely in and around the exotic islands of Cebu and Palawan in the Philippines, Deep Gold showcases explosive action, daring underwater photography and alluring international model-actresses such as Bebe Pham, Jaymee Ong and Laury Prudent.Written and Directed by Michael Gleissner, Deep Gold follows Amy Sanchez (Pham), a champion free diver who, along with her sister Jess (Ong), find themselves thrown into the middle of a deadly conspiracy. After a government plane carrying a fortune in gold - and piloted by Amy's boyfriend - goes missing over Philippine waters, Amy and Jess struggle to investigate the disappearance with help from Lulu (Prudent) and the mysterious Benny Simpson (Gleissner). But soon, the girls learn they are in over their heads.
